description:
The beginners guide to investing will help you earn while you learn about investing in the stock market! Whether its learning about the different types of stock trades, what the Dow Jones Industrial Average is, or the difference between small cap and blue chip stocks, we give you all the necessary tools you need to start investing confidently in the stock market! Our course is clearly organized and compiled as efficiently as possible, so you don't need to sit in front of your computer all day to just to barely understand the concept. We at College Capital want you to start making money and learning about the stock market, and those are our two ultimate goals for those who take this course!

By the end of this course, you will be abel to 

  • Identify Your Investment Goals
  • Choose A Trading Strategy That Will Help You Achieve Your Goal
  • Identify Different Types Of Stocks And Different Markets
  • Execute The Proper Trade Types To Maximize Your Profit
  • Establish A Set Of Personal Trading Rules To Live By
  • Possess The Basic Knowledge Needed To Become A Successful Stock Trader
title: Beginner's Guide To Investing: Earn While You Learn Today!
